title: $XRP Surpasses Bitcoin in Trading Volume as Price Skyrockets After Court Ruling
description: The native token of the XRP Ledger, $XRP, has rise not the top of the cryptocurrency space when it comes to trading volume, now accounting for a stunning 21% of the market’s volume amid a price explosion of over 60% in a single week. According to Kaiko, XRP’s trading volume exploded after a federal judge […]
